details: SLORegistry is a contract for handling creation of service level objectives and querying those service level objectives

SLOCreated(address,uint256,uint8).details: event for service level objective creation logging

params.slo: 1.  the address of the created service level objective contract

createSLO(uint256,uint8).details: public function for creating service level objectives

isRegisteredSLO(address).details: checks is the _sloAddress is registered as deployed

title: SLORegistry
